name: Thunder's Leaves
description:
Thunder's Leaves is a modification about Combine technologies and their usage by rebels.

The action of the mod takes place long after the events of Episode Two. Humans have regained control of Earth, the ruined cities are being restored after the havoc of the Liberation war. But the fighting against the Combine occupation forces continues, rebels learn to use Combine technologies to recover the lost resources and resist the onslaught of the Combine.

Features:

  • Unusual opportunities.
    Equip yourself with an electrical armor that is charged by shocks. Use the new rebel devices to confront the enemy!
  • Story characters.
    Captain Colbert, engineer Felix and Zander are some of the main characters.
  • New locations.
    Explore the suburbs and outskirts of the ruined city.
  • New enemies.
    A merciless suppressor, a charged zombie and others.
